summary: This is a letter from inmate Rev. Daniel A. Ward, written from the Southern Ohio Correctional Facility, addressed to the FBI Director in Cleveland. The letter contains allegations of government corruption, harassment, and a cover-up in Ohio, and references a legal case (Ward v. State of Ohio). The text is largely garbled but indicates the writer is attempting to report misconduct.

keyFacts: The document is an inmate free letter from the Southern Ohio Correctional Facility.
The author, Rev. Daniel A. Ward, is alleging a government cover-up, corruption, and harassment in the state of Ohio.
The letter is addressed to the FBI Director in Cleveland, indicating an attempt to report these allegations to federal law enforcement.
The text references a legal case: 'Ward v. State of Ohio'.
The document's content is heavily garbled and difficult to parse, suggesting it may be a scan of handwritten text or contains numerous errors.
